enMeaning: a long comfortable seat with a back and arms, for two or more people to sit on
a comfortable chair with sides on which you can rest your arms
a device that uses electricity, oil or gas to produce light
a piece of furniture that consists of a flat top supported by legs
a square or rectangular piece of cloth filled with soft material, used to rest your head on in bed
a thick layer of something on the ground
a picture that has been painted
an opening in the wall or roof of a building, car, etc., usually covered with glass, that allows light and air to come in and people to see out; the glass in a window
